name: purify
effect: Cures the target of its major status ailment and heals the user for 50% of its max HP. If the target has no major status ailment, this move will fail.
short_effect: Cures the target of a major status ailment and heals the user for 50% of its max HP.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user heals the target’s status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.
